patthana8.37:1.1_0: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana8.37:1.1_1: Nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—cittaṁ paṭicca cittasampayuttakā khandhā.
patthana8.37:2.1_0: (Paccanīyadukamattāni na vattabbaṁ dhammaṁ pūretuṁ nava nava pañhāni karotu.)
